column3: “Gather children, let me tell you the story about SA. Sour Apple is that girl in your class who you didn't even know was in your class to begin with. She is plain, boring and doesn't seem to give a damn about anyone around her. You're at party and every hot girl there is either too good for you to approach her or you're scared of that buff guy around her who you think is her boyfriend. Life sucks now because your plan...”

“Very Strong and Oh So Fruity! I have been using sour apple for a few months now and it's grown to be a nice strain that's made it's way onto my fave list.
The Bud: Super frosty as if these small dime shaped funky chunky looking nugs that are light green and have bright sherbert hairs; these are super dense to bust open, lots of cbg is released and the trichs on my finger tips aren't coming off. Dunked in the sugar bo...”

“10/7/15
Reviewer: GreenPeaceGlobal
Information: Sour Apple Strain
Quality: High End Mids
Location Grown: Central California
Growth date: June-August
Harvest: August-September
Use: Recreational/ Medicinal

Review: Strain felt like a hybrid. Left user in a state of energetic tendencies. User also felt like sticking to the couch various times. 

Device effects: 
Bong: Smoother as time went on. After three bowls inhalati...”
“Very happy, euphoric strain. Reminiscent of Sour Diesel but I would say it's a bit more of a cerebral buzz. Very nice and very much a true hybrid feeling. Very heady but not energy-draining.”

“Sour Apple is a wonderful, gentle hybrid strain.  I'd like to categorize it as sativa-dominant, but there is a nice body component that develops in longer smoke sessions.  This strain's mental effects are on the quiet, introspective side of things.  Reflective and soft, rather than mentally energizing, Sour Apple is a great choice when needing a moment to think things through.  The relaxed body high that evolved as I...”

“This was one of the more expensive strains that I've bought. The great thing about sour apple is that you are very much aware of how high you are, so if you wanted to smoke and run some errands, you'd very easily be able to moderate yourself. Not to mention that after about 2 bowls, I was FLYING. Everything was hilarious, and there wasn't a single sad thought in my mind, even a few days after smoking (I go on toleran...”

“Sour apple is wonderful. I really only have to take one hit to feel great with this strain. This strain is gentle and it doesn’t give you that “wow I’m definitely high” feeling, but that can certainly be a good thing. That’s why this strain is best for the nighttime. If you wanna just chill out and clear your mind. If you want to feel good all over this is the strain for you. After one hit I feel so relaxed and focus...”

“There have been some beautiful late harvest buds around the OC lately, busty and plump, with coatings of amber trichromes.  Sour Candy Apple has dark leaves and light emerald flowers, flush with pale hairs.  There is a fruit scent similar to an apple or pear.  It’s a bit piney also, but barely so.  The buds I got were really fresh, making them hard to break up.  Once they dried after a moment or two on a dish, they w...”

“First thing you notice is how much it really does taste like sour apples. It has a sour, candy like inhale, and exhale is sour and even a little spicy. 
Terpene quality is through the roof. 

It feels like a good blend between Indica and Sativa; my face gets the tingly, melting feeling while im flying over skylines in my mind. But if it were anything, it leans towards the Indica side. 
Another user stated it already,...”

“Pain, and anxiety take a hike when you med up with this girl!! The terps are exquisite and smooth. Sweet and tangy on exhale, she tastes nice. Very good for a day time smoke as it gives you a bit of pep in your step. Definitely a new favorite!! Very good representation of a sativa dominant hybrid!!”

“With notes reminiscent to Granny Smith Apple, this cross of Sour Diesel and Cinderella 99, abolishes stress, provides plenty of pain relief, and gives a boost of energy, staying true to being to its sativa roots. 
You will be licking your lips after trying this strain. 

Vaporization recommend.”

“This strain doesn't hit hard like blue dream would, instead it is a very mellow, calming, and happy bud. I took a nice joint of this and went biking, and it was the most carefree and lovely trips I've had. At one point I laid down on a grassy hill and took a snapshot of the beautiful weather and surroundings, and laid there in the sun for a while until I got up and continued pleasantly biking. Tastes and even smells ...”
“Sour Apple is nice and smooth, great body high and nice happy head feel. Fuzzy and warm.”
“I've been having a hard time finding one that works for my GAD and major depression. I feel wonderful. No stress and  happy. Just the way I like it.”

“The special of the day at Glisan Buds was Sour Apple for $10/gram.  It tested out at 24.4% THC and .4% CBD.  It's a 60/40 sativa leaning hybrid, and that is how it feels on me.  The nugs were super dense.

Sour Apple is tart, a real lip puckering, teeth freezing, uplifting apple smell and taste! How we have been able to breed this plant to get a specific flavor blows me away.  I know that some nutes enhance certain f...”
“This is a strain I can do without. For some reason the one I got did nothing for me . Didnt have a strong smell to it. Must have gotten a bad batch . Not something I will try again.”
“I've been having a hard time finding one that works for my GAD and major depression. I feel wonderful. No stress and  happy. Just the way I like it.”
“This is a strain I can do without. For some reason the one I got did nothing for me . Didnt have a strong smell to it. Must have gotten a bad batch . Not something I will try again.”

“Flavor train coming through!!! What a delicious smoke, nice bright fresh apple and lime notes on inhale and exhale. Light smoke no caugh. 

Started with quick body relaxation and numbing. Maintained relaxed body high with a quick burst of mental focus that quickly faded for a sleepy high. This strain calls you to bed and you won't want to fight it. What a great nights sleep! Don't miss this one but clear your schedul...”

“Instantly felt after two strong smooth pulls! The effects are dreamy makes you feel like you have clouds under your body lol and I loved the taste as well has that candy effect and is sweet and smooth with a faint of purge in it to give you a kick in your chest!! Hope you guys enjoyed this as much as me !! Highly recommend for anyone wanting to feel a body high and relaxtion at its finest 👌🏽👍🏽”
“Definitely worth a try, it has that apple flavour spot on and it’s perfect for just relaxing”

“Potent bud. When I first saw it, it was in big dense buds. They were big and darkish purple and frosted wish crystals. It also smelled of apples/fruit. This bud is amazing it tastes and burns so good everything about it was enjoyable. It gives strong highs that creep up on you, and all of a sudden your baked as hell sittin there like holy shit. 

-J Man Cool”
“Nice apple smell and good smoke but lacks that hit  ya in the head I'M HIGH,HIGH.”

“Sour Apple is a happy, giggly strain that will wow you with its smell and taste. Great for insomnia, but if you're not an insomniac you might be turned off a bit by its tendency to put you to sleep a few hours after smoking - nothing that can't be fought off with food and loud music, of course. Very solid strain overall.”

“Instantly felt after two strong smooth pulls! The effects are dreamy makes you feel like you have clouds under your body lol and I loved the taste as well has that candy effect and is sweet and smooth with a faint of purge in it to give you a kick in your chest!! Hope you guys enjoyed this as much as me !! Highly recommend for anyone wanting to feel a body high and relaxtion at its finest 👌🏽👍🏽”

“This strain can be deceiving. For me it either left me energetic or glued to the couch. Steamroller use with this strain can pack a punch. Bong use after considerable amount of bowls will feel smoother each hit. Slight headband feel nukes will go off in your head". Hunger does become onset towards the end of the high. Can make you feel immobile at times. Recommended storage is a mason jar with a pc. of tissue at the...”"

“I'm surprised how much this stuff actually tastes like it's name suggests. That signature sour diesel taste is balanced by apples on the exhale. This strains smell is a mixture between high quality herb/apples/sour diesel.

Sour Apple is relaxing without being sedating; clearheaded but not due to low potency; the high this strain provides reminds me of how all the best psychedelics come in waves... At times, the into...”
“For sure sativa and taste the hints of diesel ..this may just be another one of my favorites! (No lighters to my flower only HempWick)”
“This was a buzz that left me pretty tingly. I was happy hanging by the fire and hearing the waves. a little giggley and carefree.”

“Made me feel happy and carefree
Also felt paranoid but mainly because of things that happened during the high”

“Potent bud. When I first saw it, it was in big dense buds. They were big and darkish purple and frosted wish crystals. It also smelled of apples/fruit. This bud is amazing it tastes and burns so good everything about it was enjoyable. It gives strong highs that creep up on you, and all of a sudden your baked as hell sittin there like holy shit. 

-J Man Cool”
“Nice apple smell and good smoke but lacks that hit  ya in the head I'M HIGH,HIGH.”
“For sure sativa and taste the hints of diesel ..this may just be another one of my favorites! (No lighters to my flower only HempWick)”
“You simply smell the bag and WTF is in there? Apple tea?". Strong apple smell and flavour
column4: with a soft base of lemon. The high is not heavy
column6: best for afternoon or early evenings. Could be more strong for beginners. Really good shit for chillin in peace and forget every problem. Feeling stressed? Apple is here for you. 4.5”"

column3: “One of the better strains I got in oil form for vaping. Had me too high to even remember most of the ones I've had, but the only one I can think of that is better from that oil line with strains is the limited edition Kosher Kush one (obv, one of the greatest strains of all time!!). Its space vape: alien sour apple (92%thc). Bought from the local dispensary in PA (I've waited many years to be able to honestly say tha...”
“I got some rosin of this and omg it completely helps me with my ptsd management”
“Wonderful sour apple taste. Works great on insomnia. Also relieves muscle spasms. Removed me from a depressing state of mind. Have to say this is one of my favorites!”

“Sour Apple is a happy, giggly strain that will wow you with its smell and taste. Great for insomnia, but if you're not an insomniac you might be turned off a bit by its tendency to put you to sleep a few hours after smoking - nothing that can't be fought off with food and loud music, of course. Very solid strain overall.”
“This was a buzz that left me pretty tingly. I was happy hanging by the fire and hearing the waves. a little giggley and carefree.”
“Impressed me with the smell and taste. About normal pricing (was $45 1/8). Am I wanting to get more?? Nah, I can do without.”
“I got some rosin of this and omg it completely helps me with my ptsd management”

“I'm surprised how much this stuff actually tastes like it's name suggests. That signature sour diesel taste is balanced by apples on the exhale. This strains smell is a mixture between high quality herb/apples/sour diesel.

Sour Apple is relaxing without being sedating; clearheaded but not due to low potency; the high this strain provides reminds me of how all the best psychedelics come in waves... At times, the into...”
“You simply smell the bag and WTF is in there? Apple tea?". Strong apple smell and flavour
column4: with a soft base of lemon. The high is not heavy
column6: best for afternoon or early evenings. Could be more strong for beginners. Really good shit for chillin in peace and forget every problem. Feeling stressed? Apple is here for you. 4.5”"

column3: “Sour Apple Skunk! I used to medicate with this strain until my mmj provider stopped growing it, now its outta sight but still on my mind! The buds were rock hard and so dense, a 1/4 looked like an 1/8! The smoke flavor hinted of jolly rancher sour apple candy but not overwhelmingly so, the smell of the dry flower was musty until you cracked open a nug and released a sweet aroma with that light sour apple smell. The e...”
“Nice apple smell and good smoke but lacks that hit  ya in the head I'M HIGH,HIGH.”
“I love this strain even though my friend says it make him feel like he's going to have a heart attack he likes it as well though.”
“Wonderful sour apple taste. Works great on insomnia. Also relieves muscle spasms. Removed me from a depressing state of mind. Have to say this is one of my favorites!”

“This strain can be deceiving. For me it either left me energetic or glued to the couch. Steamroller use with this strain can pack a punch. Bong use after considerable amount of bowls will feel smoother each hit. Slight headband feel nukes will go off in your head". Hunger does become onset towards the end of the high. Can make you feel immobile at times. Recommended storage is a mason jar with a pc. of tissue at the...”"
“Definitely worth a try, it has that apple flavour spot on and it’s perfect for just relaxing”

“The Sour Apple I picked up isn't as strong as some of the past strains ive had, but it's a perfect smoke if you wanna kick back and relax on a lazy Sunday. Very mellow and calming high that made me just want to cozy up on the couch and read my zombie book. Not as strong of a apple smell as other people have been saying. It smells nice and danky with a little zing of sour at the end. Another lovely strain for the jour...”

“Instantly felt after two strong smooth pulls! The effects are dreamy makes you feel like you have clouds under your body lol and I loved the taste as well has that candy effect and is sweet and smooth with a faint of purge in it to give you a kick in your chest!! Hope you guys enjoyed this as much as me !! Highly recommend for anyone wanting to feel a body high and relaxtion at its finest 👌🏽👍🏽”
“Nice apple smell and good smoke but lacks that hit  ya in the head I'M HIGH,HIGH.”
“had it didn't like it. you get a faint apple taste but the effects are very short and mild. I would need to consume more of it to achieve a basic flow. which is a bad thing to me”
“Smoked about an eighth of this in less then a week. Good shit.”

“I think this strain lives up to its definition here in leafy my dealer had a cartridge of sour apple from filthy labs it was testing at an outstanding 94 percent thc definitely a go to if you’re feeling moody !”

“Sour apple has a great after taste and smokes very smoothly. This baby definitely gets the creative juices flowing but is so relaxing that it's not easy acting on it. I probably wouldn't smoke this at work, but definitely a great bud for a wake and bake on a Saturday morning.”

“I think this strain lives up to its definition here in leafy my dealer had a cartridge of sour apple from filthy labs it was testing at an outstanding 94 percent thc definitely a go to if you’re feeling moody !”

“another strain is Sour Waldo. This is very potent and excellent pain relief and get going. In the first 5 minutes the ride begins the spicy taste is very soothing but if you stay on the couch, you will stay on the couch. I Highly recommend  everyone try this strain”

“Sour apple has a great after taste and smokes very smoothly. This baby definitely gets the creative juices flowing but is so relaxing that it's not easy acting on it. I probably wouldn't smoke this at work, but definitely a great bud for a wake and bake on a Saturday morning.”
“Got the dank carti from cali. it's a nice indica hybrid 🔥”
“gives me a headache every time I vape it. nice high until the headaches starts. after this cartridge I don't think I'll get it again.”
“Taste Like A Green Apple Airhead 💦”
“great taste. got me feeling better after one inhale. if you love the way your meacine taste this is perfect strain”

“This strain tasted like the best Granny Smith apple you could pick. Super smooth smoke that just relaxes you completely. Green apples were always my fave now this green has took number 1 in my books. Get this from chronickkushco.ca”
“Amazing looking dense nugs. Wonderful sour apple smell to it. Definitely a good strain for after a long day and just want to relax”
“absolutely....love....it! just had some earlier and im still feeling it👍👍👍👌🍎🍏”
“Taste and smell is like no other. The high was good, I wouldn't say great". But still a very strong strain.”"

“Not really the kinda high I like. Doesn't help with pain much and coming down often brings with it the urge to jerk off, passing out, and/or an intense headache. It hits pretty hard, though, and helps with my depression problems”
“Wonderful sour apple taste. Works great on insomnia. Also relieves muscle spasms. Removed me from a depressing state of mind. Have to say this is one of my favorites!”
“It’s a great use for indica def if u like that I’m stuck feeling great for sleep if u angry this will def bring it down to calming more talkative mood!”

“The Sour Apple I picked up had a real nice sweet fruity aroma. It has a nice clean smoke. It has a nice balance between cerebral and body. My was clear and my body relaxed and melted into the couch a little. Check it out if you can.”

“AMAZING! My favorite strain, a wonderful hybrid. The body high is great, very relaxed but not overwhelming. Great for use during the day. The smell is sweet and the taste is better, it’s fluffy and crystallized. Just an overall good time, especially if you need to operate normally during the day.”
“This strain was nice and smelled like sour Diesel and  apples. had a really nice taste also. Recommend vaporizing it if you love to taste it”
“tingley greatness that killed my stress.”

“2 pipe hits in (let the mild high take flight): A happy indica with some sativa like qualities. Just enough relax that's felt in my face, tops of my feet, and shoulders. This strain, Enjoyable happy uplifting feelings, with a smidgen of the desire to do subtle activities. Bars, and other social settings would be deemed doable for this level of high. 

Anymore hits: A couch, a movie, chill night with a game of Cards A...”
“Taste Like A Green Apple Airhead 💦”

“At first I didn't like the taste, but it grew on me, kinda like the flavor of hard cider. The high was very subtle, it's a great early morning strain, I'd roll over, take a toke, my headache would subside, and I could rest another 30-40 minutes. That being said, it didn't seem very strong. I was using a brass knuckles cartridge tested at 66%, but I could barely feel anything, I had to use almost .3g of the cart to ge...”
“Nice mellow but definitely couch bound”

“DELICIOUS.  Oh my goodness!!  I could smoke an ounce of this and not realize because it's just so dang tasty!  Which is good because it takes more than average to get medicated.  Not quite as strong as ever advertised.  That being said, no anxiety, no panics, and pleasant overall feel consistently.  Very good for PTSD.”
“Perfect post work. First up then down. Nice reset button for the day.”

“Wow. Perfectly cured, potent, long lasting and so tasty.  When I run the smoke through my sinuses I can taste honeysuckle.  This is a new favourite.  Great relaxing body buzz with an energetic uplifting head high.  Great for sex. Perfect blend for getting things done. Smoking too much can give me a mild headache.”

“Smells lightly like Granny Smith Apples, this doesn't carry over to the taste, atleast not my batch.  Tastes were sour and slight pineapple on the exhale.  Mild, chill buzz, good for catching a flick.  Like the Apple, this strain imparts subtle simple truthes.  Women, if you are into yoga, this is a good pre session sacrament to get your esoteric juices flowing”
“Yummy! 👌🏻”

“Pretty good mind numbing strain. It's a bit of a creeper but when it comes in, it comes in strong. But like most strains that have a fruit in their name, it means that you come down from the high very quickly. But like I said, while you're high it's a powerful one.”

“Hybrids, in my opinion are the best of both worlds, and Sour Apple is the perfect example of why. Although it packs a punch, you'd hardly notice because of how smooth it is. The body is relaxed with a slight boost of energy. Perfect to enjoy with a funny movie or with the homies. It hits instantly too hahhaha”
“great taste, great high”

“A very nice indica dominate hybrid. Nice smell of apple on exhale and smell of apples in the air after a smoke session is nice. Not my favorite but a cool strain to try. GSC and gorilla glue #4 will always be in my heart lol. Would love to get my hands on some alien sour apple!”
“some fire...smooth bong rips:)”
“Really thick smoke, kinda hurts but the after effect is worth it”
“like your body is being wrapped in a warm fur blanket while cool air blows lightly on your face”
“Got me happy, giggly high. Then the munchies!”
“Great stuff”
“very nice”
“Feeling relaxed and it instantly relieved me of my anxiety. The flavor was awesome, kind of like candy. I would definitely recommend this strain for ending a long day/cuddling in bed”
“Good couch lock high.. Taste just like sour apples.. Made my mouth water even after smoking”
“ALL I HAVE TO SAY ABOUT SOUR APPLE" IS  THAT IT TASTES JUST LIKE THE ITS NAME...TWO THUMBS UP.. LOVED IT...”"

“When I lit the sour apple J outdoors, I was getting very good vibes- kind of like the world was tilted at a perfect axis and everything was right. I was happy with a hint of euphoria at first, and I was feeling pretty adventurous too. But as soon as it started to hit me, I was getting a little tired down. Eventually when the bud was wearing off I was tired to the point I couldn't keep my eyes open, so I went home and...”

“tried this in Amsterdam and was blown away by the aroma of this herb,hard to effects as was already medicated before trying but could tell it packed a punch, im hoping the parcel i sent from Amsterdam containing more sour apples makes it back home ; ) time will tell”
“been smoking this the past day and i have to say its one of my favorite. almost done with the quarter bout go buy some more bud :) stay high”
“Great flavor, awesome high. Happy yet sleepy.”
“stay away from sour apple”
“Super energetic and happy high, but gives me a headache after. Would recommend for beach trips or any day adventure.”

“I remember this is the first time I ever paid $25 for a gram and boy was it worth it. bright green color and a nice sour ting I could have sworn I was biting into a granny simth. Baked a lot with it at home and with my Best home P-Lantis a few times on his porch.”
“now considered in top 5.....”
“Great tasting shatter!”
“It got me pretty high but overall the best part was that it tasted so much like apple in general the high was a 3star and the taste was a 5 star so overall I gave it a 4”
“Nice soothing, sour apple-citrusy taste...distinctive diesel smell as well. Very potent, may leave you couchlocked!...afternoon-evening type smoke!”
“Being part of the kush family as you know with me automatically begins at three Stars. Given the Apple properties took it up a notch.”

“Always enjoy this strain's kickass potency with above average THC percentages that creep up in a slow crawl. The sour taste invigorates long enough to get settled into the comfort zone with munchies, remote, book, pillow & cozy blanket. After a half hour has passed the full effect of rest & relaxation will be felt so enjoy!! This bud smells much like it tastes, except it does tend to linger on tongue for a long time....”

“Dam. Tastes like sour apple straight up. That's insane. Okay anyway makes u cough like baby with high THC and smacks me in the face after the second hit. Really PERFECT FOR BODY ANXIETY AND PTSD ANXIETY BODY RELATED WISE. TAKES IT RIGHT AWAY. Also very calming yet not fogging the mind too much.”

“This one is delicious and sweet. Very smooth high, and after one decent lung full, I was GONE. (yeah yeah, I'm a bit of a lightweight.) 
Very distinct notes of fruit, mainly apple (so sayeth the name). 
One BIG thing for me. I get migraines. Ones that put me down and all I can do is groan and pray.
This beautiful, sweet, amazing strain gets rid of my migraines FAST. 
Bless this bud.”
“F I R E!! shit hits not as hard as diesel dawg but im baked as fuck. Very Amazing budski”

“Nappy Time bud... I usually can pass out within 20 minutes if I smoke it right as I am winding down for bed.... Dense buds... Tastes like sour apple a little bit... It was a nice batch... nothing to rave over, but definitely wouldn't complain.... except I was looking for more of a sativa and I ended up with that.... It's all good”
“this one is fun!  fluffy high but also couch lockish.”
“definitely one of the bests high of my life had a happy trance it was crazy like I had such a feeling like if nothing could go wrong . it was great I was so happy!!!!”
“it tastes great, and it's very great for insomnia. everything's just great. Yes.”

“How do I like these apples? I like these apples quite a bit! I found this strain to provide a balanced jolt of energy that helps you remain productive after partaking. I felt focused and ready to accomplish my daily tasks.. Definitely give this a try if you're looking to have energy with the ability to focus. I did not experience noticeable pain relief. I found the high to be more heady, but still very nice! Cheers!”
“Really good strain love it especially in the morning”
“Amazing strain, tastes like apple, smells sweet, feels like you're having dessert. Mellow high, makes you want to chill instantly. Perfect at any time of the day if you want something special.”

“A very nice indica dominate hybrid. Nice smell of apple on exhale and smell of apples in the air after a smoke session is nice. Not my favorite but a cool strain to try. GSC and gorilla glue #4 will always be in my heart lol. Would love to get my hands on some alien sour apple!”
“Good for starting the day🍁😧👌”

“The Sour Apple I picked up had a real nice sweet fruity aroma. It has a nice clean smoke. It has a nice balance between cerebral and body. My was clear and my body relaxed and melted into the couch a little. Check it out if you can.”
“Great morning buzz. Grabbed this from lux. Gave me the focus and drive to get up and get going.”
“It's the indica version of a Sunday strain"
column4: the kind you smoke to kick it and chill on Sunday mornings afternoons and evenings. It's tasty
column5: which is a great novelty in and of itself
column6: and it has a smooth predicable high that keeps you satisfied and operational. It might not be as meteor-smashing as some indica enthusiasts would want
column7: but Sour Apple certainly reflects in all senses of the word

column3: “I absolutely love this strain. The taste wakes up your taste buds and it makes you the perfect amount of relaxation, not too sleepy, just perfect. Doesn't hurt my throat, big plus. Definitely suggest :)”

“Decent. Euphoric then brought on a heavy sedation feeling. Too much of this definitely gives me couch lock.
Smell and taste kind of reminded me of a woody apple jacks.”
“Good couch lock high if ur able to fight off the sleep.. Shit start mellow but feels like it gradually grows..good bud try if ur able”

“VERY sticky nugs.

As a nighttime medicine this was perfect. Knocked me on my ass within 30 minutes. Slept like a baby.”
“just some good quality giggles and a great walking strain”
“felt really relaxed”

“AMAZING! My favorite strain, a wonderful hybrid. The body high is great, very relaxed but not overwhelming. Great for use during the day. The smell is sweet and the taste is better, it’s fluffy and crystallized. Just an overall good time, especially if you need to operate normally during the day.”
“Ive grown it and used it in all forms and overall its a great strain...keeper in my garden”
“pass the candy, I mean weed.  with the apple flavor mixed with a sour lemon taste this pot is a must for any pot lover.”
“It's fantastic! I love hybrids!”

“I didn't get so much of the tricky sour flavor, but sure did love the buzz. I had been enjoying a day out with friends burning some really solid OG prerolls when we broke this out for context. Skyrocketed to a new level and at the same time had some serious heavy eyes. Giggly couchlock? I'll have to try this again...”
“Great high, nice to wake and bake! And actually get things done! Relaxing and yet a good upper ! Definitely recommending this to stoners who want that relaxing but a lift of an upper !”
“It’s a great use for indica def if u like that I’m stuck feeling great for sleep if u angry this will def bring it down to calming more talkative mood!”
“absolutely....love....it! just had some earlier and im still feeling it👍👍👍👌🍎🍏”

“This strain tasted like the best Granny Smith apple you could pick. Super smooth smoke that just relaxes you completely. Green apples were always my fave now this green has took number 1 in my books. Get this from chronickkushco.ca”
“Got the dank carti from cali. it's a nice indica hybrid 🔥”

“I think this strain lives up to its definition here in leafy my dealer had a cartridge of sour apple from filthy labs it was testing at an outstanding 94 percent thc definitely a go to if you’re feeling moody !”
“tingley greatness that killed my stress.”

“At first I didn't like the taste, but it grew on me, kinda like the flavor of hard cider. The high was very subtle, it's a great early morning strain, I'd roll over, take a toke, my headache would subside, and I could rest another 30-40 minutes. That being said, it didn't seem very strong. I was using a brass knuckles cartridge tested at 66%, but I could barely feel anything, I had to use almost .3g of the cart to ge...”

“I vaped wax crumble off a cut portion of soda-can liner [touching a lighter(not a torch) to the soda-can bottom] and chasing the dragon" of vapor through my favorite chillum. I held the sour-apple candy flavor tasting vapor in for about 30-40 seconds. Blew my head away after a few pulls of this
column4: I had to sit "the climb" down!! After about another couple minutes
column5: I was ok to do anything creative while being talkative...”"

column3: “Very strong ambient high, leaves your body feeling very tingly.”
“I’ve been off work so I decided to use this as a wake n bake... omg it had my mind up but my body glued to the couch! The nap that followed was everything!!!”
“smell of sour apple candy and great flavor! one of the favorites for sure!”
“This strain is absolutely great! Strong smell and dense nugs”
“It’ll relax you, you’ll wake up wondering where the times went. Unproductive strain IMO”

“WOW it really does smell and taste like sour apple.. so awesome.  Seems to burn really well and stays lit in a joint.  Gonna try some vape next ;)  I really wish I had the space to grow a sativa like this...”
“This stuff taste so fruity. Some nice red hairs on these dense packed nuts.”
“gives me a headache every time I vape it. nice high until the headaches starts. after this cartridge I don't think I'll get it again.”
“Great high, huge buds.”

“DELICIOUS.  Oh my goodness!!  I could smoke an ounce of this and not realize because it's just so dang tasty!  Which is good because it takes more than average to get medicated.  Not quite as strong as ever advertised.  That being said, no anxiety, no panics, and pleasant overall feel consistently.  Very good for PTSD.”
“Nice mellow but definitely couch bound”
“Taste Like A Green Apple Airhead 💦”

“2 pipe hits in (let the mild high take flight): A happy indica with some sativa like qualities. Just enough relax that's felt in my face, tops of my feet, and shoulders. This strain, Enjoyable happy uplifting feelings, with a smidgen of the desire to do subtle activities. Bars, and other social settings would be deemed doable for this level of high. 

Anymore hits: A couch, a movie, chill night with a game of Cards A...”

“Great taste and smell. Easy to smoke, and easy to get the full effect. Medically, the buds amplified the mood, added to productivity, and alleviated some of the pain. It didn't give me any couch lock, but I didn't get too active, which can happen and then there's more pain when the medicine wears off. If I'm just sitting around, it pairs well with video games, reading and dog walking.”
“This strain was nice and smelled like sour Diesel and  apples. had a really nice taste also. Recommend vaporizing it if you love to taste it”
“WOW it really does smell and taste like sour apple.  I really wish I had the space to grow a sativa like this...”
“Wonderful sour apple taste. Works great on insomnia. Also relieves muscle spasms. Removed me from a depressing state of mind. Have to say this is one of my favorites!”

“Not really the kinda high I like. Doesn't help with pain much and coming down often brings with it the urge to jerk off, passing out, and/or an intense headache. It hits pretty hard, though, and helps with my depression problems”
“Taste and smell is like no other. The high was good, I wouldn't say great". But still a very strong strain.”"
“Amazing looking dense nugs. Wonderful sour apple smell to it. Definitely a good strain for after a long day and just want to relax”
“Cannot recomend. I am exteamly disappointed. Crumbly and brittle, it may as well be hay, horse food even. Stay far away from.”
“definitely can taste the apple, nice evening high forsure”
